name: Chill Art Jardin Botanico

reviews.title: Jardi Botanico-fabulous
reviews.text: A great little hotel- exceptional for the price band-good welcome, quiet, big rooms with wooden floors-clean and lots of extras, such as CD player and tea coffee facilities,jacuzzi baths in every room.
Reception staff were all exceptional in their ability to offer advice and help. A cool modern hotel where they practise old fashioned 5 star customer service.
reviews.title: wonderful place and best value in town
What a nice hotel
reviews.text: We would easily stay here again-friendly and everything you need. On the edges of the old town, it is fairly close to the action.

reviews.title: Nightmarish to find by car
reviews.text: I'm unsure how to write this review. This is a lovely little hotel located near the art institute and the botanical garden. It was a nightmare finding it by car; we drove around and the around the city for almost two hours until we made it to the door. We realized that we should have rented the GPS unit! Although we "knew" where the hotel was, the tiny maze of one-way streets was almost impossible to navigate and we ARE used to urban driving.

reviews.title: Great little hotel
reviews.text: The hotel, once found, was very contemporary and clean. The facilities were excellent, the AC was above average, and there was a free public computer to use. Breakfast is served in a light, airy restaurant. It is about a ten minute walk to the old city and the nightlife. Valencia was probably the dirtiest city we visited in our 9 city Spanish trip. The bars obviously cater to throngs of tourists. We were there during America Cup trials.

reviews.title: Clean & New, but somewhat spartan
reviews.text: A group of 8 of us visited the Hotel Jardin Botanico for the weekend of 1st to 3rd December. Booked via Charming Spain Hotels (a very efficient company who I have used a number of times now).

reviews.title: Very nice hote.
reviews.text: The hotel is nicely decorated in a contemporary style. It's well located for the old city and, in particular, the nightlife. Staff were welcoming, always friendly and helpful. The rooms we had were spacious and clean. Both Charming Spain Hotels and Hotel Jardin Botanico dealt very promptly with a late increase in the number of rooms I required. Would recommend staying here.

reviews.title: Great Value and Location
reviews.text: The Jardin Botanico is located near the botanical garden and very close to the riverbed park developed on the site of the now-diverted river. It is a 2-3 mile walk through the park to new City of Arts & Science, worth the trip to Valencia in itself. (Or you can take the #95 bus along the same route for 1.10eu per person). In one mile you can be at cathedral and its magnificent square, and also the beautiful Lonja (silk exchange).

aka: Chill Art Jardin Botanico Hotel Valencia
